name: Pgu-lang
tagline: Games and tools for learning foreign languages.
body:
### Purpose
Games with symbols and a translation service to help learning other languages.

### Current symbols
* Japanese
  * Hiragana あ お い う え...
  * Katakana ア オ イ ウ エ...
  * Kanji 日 月 火 水 木 金 土...
* Korean ㄱ ㄴ ㄷ ㄹ ㅁ...
* Russian Б Г Д Ж Ф...
* Arabic ﺏ ﺥ ﺱ ﻁ ﻑ ﻙ...

### Website
[Play and learn!](http://pgu-lang.appspot.com/)

Note that the style is done for use on a mobile phone.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
